featured.text: I’ve just 32 that I’ll die very soon and I’m going to be reborn as a pig.
Before the disciple could recover from the 39 of hearing the little pig speak in a human voice, it continued, “Don’t kill me.
Soon after their 36 , the guru died and the sow did have a litter of four little pigs.
Then the disciple 37 his knife and picked out the little pig with a mark on its brow.

other.text: I’ll then be 35 from a pig’s life.
When I asked you to kill me, I didn’t know what a pig’s life would be 40 .
When he was about to cut its throat, the little pig suddenly 38 , “Stop!”
I want to live on as a pig.

definition.zh_def: 豬，一種常見的家畜，通常用於肉類生產。
definition.en_def: A pig is a common domesticated animal, often raised for its meat.
definition.example: The farmer has several pigs on his farm.
